summary: Lowers global timescale to 5 ingame minutes per real life minute.
descriptionHtml:
Global timescale altered to 5. Basically that means that 1 minute in real life is 5 minutes in game. So a in game day lasts for 2 hours and 48 minutes in real life.
I know there\'s another version made by Frontsalat, but his files doesn\'t seem to work at all.
Different timescales will be made on request only.
author: DragonBoon
